data.title: Be Delivered and Free From Fear In Christ Jesus
data.meta_description: Jesus has redeemed you from the curse of fear! This week, on Believer’s Voice of Victory, join Kenneth Copeland as he reveals that a fear-free life has been made available to you through Christ Jesus. Discover how following God’s commands and staying connected to God’s Love through faith will disconnect you from all fear! Study notes available at kcm.org/notes

Your gift will help us share life-changing messages like this with people around the world.

In this video

Jesus has redeemed you from the curse of fear! This week, on Believer’s Voice of Victory, join Kenneth Copeland as he reveals that a fear-free life has been made available to you through Christ Jesus. Discover how following God’s commands and staying connected to God’s Love through faith will disconnect you from all fear! Study notes available at kcm.org/notes

Today's TV Offer

This week's series » Be Delivered and Free From Fear In Christ Jesus

Monday

Be Delivered and Free From Fear In Christ Jesus

Tuesday

Following God’s Commands Will Free You From Fear

Wednesday

Jesus Has Redeemed You From the Curse of Fear

Thursday

Staying Connected to God’s Love Casts Out All Fear

Friday

Disconnect From Fear Through Faith In God’s Love

Search all Broadcasts

Keywords

Speakers

Have faith in Love! Watch Believer’s Voice of Victory as Kenneth Copeland helps you disconnect from fear though having faith in God’s Love.

What are you connected to? Watch Believer’s Voice of Victory as Kenneth Copeland reveals how staying connected to God’s Love casts out all fear.

You’ve been delivered! Join Kenneth Copeland on Believer’s Voice of Victory as he reminds you that Jesus has redeemed you from the curse of fear.

The Lord will never leave or forsake you! Watch Kenneth Copeland on Believer’s Voice of Victory as he explains how following God’s commands will free you from fear.

Fear not—the Lord is with you! Join Kenneth Copeland on Believer’s Voice of Victory and discover that in Christ Jesus, you can live free from all fear.

God is a loving Father who doesn't want your life burdened by any fearful situation in this world.

Ready to invest? Watch Believer’s Voice of Victory as Pastors George and Terri Copeland Pearsons reveal the seven habits of strong believers.

Watch Believer’s Voice of Victory as Pastors George and Terri Pearsons share Part 3 of “How To Develop a Strong Spirit: Exercise.” From praising and acknowledging God to giving—dive deeper into the many ways you c
